TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit GacInstalled extends System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase implements class System.Security.Policy.IIdentityPermissionFactory
Public NotInheritable Class GacInstalled Inherits EvidenceBase Implements IIdentityPermissionFactory
public ref class GacInstalled sealed : System::Security::Policy::EvidenceBase, System::Security::Policy::IIdentityPermissionFactory
type GacInstalled = class inherit EvidenceBase interface IIdentityPermissionFactory

Docs.summary: 确认一个代码程序集在全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 中以策略评估证据的形式产生。 此类不能被继承。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 是否存在<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled>证据生成<xref:System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermission>中程序集的授予集。 如果没有<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A>有关<xref:System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermission>，则<xref:System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermission>对应于<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled>证据进行比较所需的权限。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.Gac#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Gac/CPP/gac.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.Gac#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Gac/CS/gac.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.Gac#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Gac/VB/gac.vb#1)]
